title: Career Opportunities at Ergo
summary: The document outlines the career opportunities available at the Ergo Foundation. While full-time positions are rare, the foundation encourages engagement through compensated bounties, which allow individuals to contribute to the platform and gain a deeper understanding of it. Additionally, active participation in ecosystem discussions can help identify areas where one's skills can have an impact, serving as a stepping stone towards potential long-term collaboration with the Ergo Foundation. The foundation values diversity in knowledge and perspectives, not just technical expertise.

sections.heading: Career Opportunities at Ergo
sections.content:
While the Ergo Foundation does occasionally advertise full-time positions, these roles are often specialized and senior in nature. A more direct pathway to becoming a key member of our team is by engaging with our compensated [bounties](https://github.com/ergoplatform/grow-ergo/). These tasks not only allow you to make substantial contributions to our mission but also provide an opportunity to gain a deeper understanding of our platform.

Moreover, active participation in our ecosystem discussions can help you identify areas where your unique skills can have an impact. We value diversity in knowledge and perspectives, not just technical expertise. Whether you're a developer, a researcher, or simply an Ergo enthusiast, your insights can significantly contribute to Ergo's growth and success. This active involvement serves as an excellent stepping stone towards a potential long-term collaboration with us.
